concept-wr.title: Secondary Region
concept-wr.shortdesc: The Secondary Region system provides regional controller and compute resources, coordinated by the Primary Region.

conbody.p: The Secondary Region includes all OpenStack Services supported by the particular OpenStack Cloud, except for those services that the Primary Region is sharing with this Secondary Region.

The local services of the Secondary Region must be configured to obtain authenticated tokens and service endpoint URLs from the Primary Region Keystone service. The Primary Regionâ€™s Keystone service requires a tenant, users, services, and service endpoints for all services running in both regions.

note.p: There are no edit/delete protections on the Keystone entities that are created for the Secondary Region, as there are for those in the Primary Region. It is critical that these are not modified or deleted by the user.
